channel.title: Posts on Dan Wright
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Dan Wright

item.title: Shopping List
item.description: Inspired by Consumer Surplus, I thought it would be fun to suggest some things that I think add significant value to my life. Health Omega 3 I eat a vegetarian diet 99% of the time, so while I get a lot of Omega 3 ALA from olive oil (which I cook with exclusively) and nuts, I like to supplement algae oil to maintain the proper ratios of EPA and DHA too.

item.title: Reading List
item.description: Here’s some books or articles I’d recommend. I can’t claim this list is some sort of cohesive narrative, but I’d say all of these have something of merit regardless of political persuasion. I will add to this. Politics The Art of War, Sun Tzu. The History of the Peloponnesian War, Thucydides. Leviathan, Thomas Hobbes. The Putney Debates. I got a copy in one of the Verso sales. We forget our democratic and republican history in this country.
